amendment.description: To include a provision relating to investment earnings.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3971 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3971 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Murkowski. To include a provision relating to investment earnings.
